title: 【Upgraded】KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids, Electronic Light-up Dance Pad with Wireless Bluetooth 5 Speeds 9 Levels, Dancing Mat for Toddlers Music Game Dance Toy for Girls Boys 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 10+ Year Old
descriptions:
Introducing the KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids, the perfect way to bring joy and excitement to your little ones! This dance mat is designed with simplicity in mind, making it easily accessible to elderly folks who may be easily confused. 

With wireless Bluetooth connectivity, this dance mat pairs effortlessly with smartphones or other Bluetooth-enabled devices, allowing your child to dance to their favorite tunes. The mat offers 5 different speeds and 9 levels of difficulty, ensuring that your child can progress at their own pace. They can choose from three exciting modes - Free Dance, Memory, and Bluetooth - providing endless entertainment options.

The LED score display is clear and easy to read, keeping your child motivated and engaged. The extra-large size of the mat, measuring 39x41 inches, provides ample space for your child to move and groove. 

Safety is our top priority. The mat features a soft, cushioned surface and a non-slip silicone base, ensuring your child's safety while dancing. Made from high-quality vinyl, the mat is non-toxic, odorless, and waterproof, giving you peace of mind.

The KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids is powered by 4 AA batteries (not included), making it convenient and portable. 

Suitable for children aged 3-12 years, this dance mat is the perfect gift for any occasion, including Christmas, birthdays, and Children's Day. Not only does it provide hours of fun, but it also improves observational skills and enhances physical coordination.

Don't miss out on the KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids, the ultimate entertainment solution for your little ones! Get yours now and let the dancing begin!

Introducing the KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids! This amazing dance mat is designed to bring joy and entertainment to children of all ages. With its user-friendly features and safety considerations, it's perfect for your little ones to enjoy and explore the world of dance.

Connectivity:
Easily connect the dance mat to smartphones or other Bluetooth-enabled devices using the latest Bluetooth version 5. This allows you to play your favorite music and dance along with the beat.

Modes and Speeds:
The KIZJORYA Dance Mat offers a variety of modes to keep your child engaged and entertained. Choose from "Free Dance" mode to let them express their creativity, "Memory Mode" to challenge their memory skills, or "Bluetooth Mode" to dance along with their favorite tunes. With 5 different speeds and 9 difficulty levels, they can adjust the dance mat to their skill level and keep improving their dance moves.

LED Score Display:
The dance mat features a bright LED score display, making it easy for your child to keep track of their performance and progress. They can challenge themselves to beat their previous scores and improve their dancing skills.

Extra-Large Size:
With dimensions of 39x41 inches, this dance mat provides an extra-large space for your child to dance freely and comfortably. They can move around with ease and express themselves without any restrictions.

Safety Features:
We understand the importance of safety for your little ones. The KIZJORYA Dance Mat is made with high-quality vinyl that is non-toxic, odorless, and waterproof. The surface is soft and cushioned, ensuring a comfortable dancing experience, while the bottom is designed with non-slip silicone particles to prevent any accidents.

Power Requirement:
The dance mat operates on 4 AA batteries (not included), giving your child the freedom to dance anywhere without the hassle of wires or charging.

With its easy-to-use features, safety considerations, and endless entertainment options, the KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids is the perfect gift for any occasion, including Christmas, birthdays, and Children's Day. It not only provides fun and excitement but also helps improve observational skills and enhances physical coordination.

Don't miss out on this amazing dance mat! Get the KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids today and let your child dance their way to happiness and creativity.
